Columns.Name: 保証_保証書発行待ち件数
保証_郵送手配待ち件数
保証_郵送依頼待ち件数

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select sum((`sub`.`warranty_issue_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `保証_保証書発行待ち件数`,sum((`sub`.`warranty_check_flg` = 1)) AS `保証_保証確認中件数`,sum((`sub`.`purchase_order_waiting_flg` = 1)) AS `保証_発注書待ち件数`,sum((`sub`.`warrany_pending_flg` = 1)) AS `保証_保証保留件数`,sum((`sub`.`warranty_mailing_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `保証_郵送手配待ち件数`,sum((`sub`.`mailing_request_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `保証_郵送依頼待ち件数` from (`t_object_warranty` `main` join `m_warranty_status` `sub` on((`main`.`warranty_status_id` = `sub`.`warranty_status_id`))) where (exists(select `t_object_order`.`object_order_id` from `t_object_order` where ((`t_object_order`.`object_order_id` = `main`.`object_order_id`) and (`t_object_order`.`active_flg` = 1))) and ((`sub`.`warranty_issue_wait_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`warranty_check_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`purchase_order_waiting_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`warrany_pending_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`warranty_mailing_wait_flg` = 1) or (`sub`.`mailing_request_wait_flg` = 1)))
